Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turns

Class ActivateProductionTurn

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.turns.ActivateProductionTurn
public class ActivateProductionTurn
extends java.lang.Object
class to manage the turn to activate productions
Author:
davide grazioli

  • Constructor Details

    • ActivateProductionTurn

      public ActivateProductionTurn​(Controller controller)

      controller - controller to model that manages the game for players

  • Method Details

    • productionsActivation

      public boolean productionsActivation​(boolean useBaseProduction, Resource resourceRequested1, Resource resourceRequested2, ProductedMaterials resourceGranted, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<Resource> materialLeaders, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> useDevelop)
      Method that manage the production turn
      Parameters:
      useBaseProduction - boolean that specify if the player want to use the base production
      resourceRequested1 - if the player want to use the base production indicates the first resource to use to develop
      resourceRequested2 - if the player want to use the base production indicates the second resource to use to develop
      resourceGranted - if the player want to use the base production indicates resource granted from the base production
      useLeaders - Array of Boolean that specify if the player want to use leaders productions, the boolean is in the same position of the leader the player want to use
      materialLeaders - The material the player want from the leader production, the resource is in the same * position of the leader the player want to use
      useDevelop - Array of Boolean that specify if the player want to use a production card, the boolean is in the same * position of the production card the player want to use
      Returns:
      true if the played turn is consistent, so if the player produces something
